invalid sourceurl provided

provided sourceURL according to the format

11140.name: ErrInvalidGitHubSourceURLCode

sourceURL provided might be invalid
provided repo/version tag does not exist

11141.name: ErrGetControllerStatusCode
11141.short_description: Error getting the status of the meshery controller
11141.probable_cause: Controller may not be healthy or not deployed

11142.name: ErrDeployControllerCode

11144.name: ErrPrepareForEvalCode

query might be empty

uncommitted transaction

error during conversion from cue.Selector to string

11165.name: ErrMarshalCode

11167.name: ErrInvalidProtocolCode

File doesnt exist in the location

Insufficient permissions to read file

11171.name: ErrReadFileCode

Verify that file exist at the provided location
Verify sufficient file permissions.

11172.name: ErrWriteFileCode
11172.suggested_remediation:
Verify that file exist at the provided location
Verify sufficient file permissions.

11173.name: ErrGettingLatestReleaseTagCode
11173.short_description: Could not fetch latest stable release from github
11173.probable_cause:
Failed to make GET request to github
Invalid response received on github.com/<org>/<repo>/releases/stable
11173.suggested_remediation:
Make sure Github is reachable
Make sure a valid response is available on github.com/<org>/<repo>/releases/stable

11174.name: ErrMissingFieldCode
11174.short_description: Missing field or property with name:

11175.name: ErrExpectedTypeMismatchCode
11175.suggested_remediation: Make sure that the value provided in the manifest has the needed type.

11178.name: ErrJsonSchemaToCueCode

11179.name: ErrCueLookupCode

make sure that the path is a valid cue expression and is correct

11180.name: ErrTypeCastCode

11180.suggested_remediation: use correct data type for type casting

provide a valid path

11182.suggested_remediation:
provide a valid path
retry by using an absolute path
check for sufficient permissions for the user

11186.name: ErrReadDirCode

insufficient permissions to read the chart

11217.short_description: the service has no pod selector set

11219.name: ErrInvalidDeploymentNoSelectorsCode
11219.short_description: invalid deployment: no selectors, therefore cannot be exposed

11220.name: ErrInvalidReplicaNoSelectorsLabelsCode
11220.short_description: the replica set has no labels or selectors and cannot be exposed

11221.name: ErrInvalidReplicaSetNoSelectorsCode

11222.name: ErrNoPortsFoundForHeadlessResourceCode
11222.short_description: no ports found for the non headless resource

11224.name: ErrMatchExpressionsConvertionErrCode
11224.short_description: couldn't convert expressions - to map-based selector format

11229.name: ErrCvrtKomposeCode
11229.short_description: Error converting the docker compose file into kubernetes manifests
11229.probable_cause: Could not convert docker-compose file into kubernetes manifests
11229.suggested_remediation: Make sure the docker-compose file is valid

11230.name: ErrValidateDockerComposeFileCode
11230.suggested_remediation:
Make sure that the compose file is valid,
Make sure that the schema is valid

11231.name: ErrIncompatibleVersionCode
11231.long_description: This docker compose file is invalid since it's version is incompatible.
11231.short_description: This version of docker compose file is not compatible.
11231.probable_cause: docker compose file with version greater than 3.3 is probably being used
11231.suggested_remediation: Make sure that the compose file has version less than or equal to 3.3,

11232.name: ErrNoVersionCode
11232.short_description: version not found in the docker compose file
11232.probable_cause: Since the Docker Compose specification does not mandate the version field from version 3 onwards, most sources do not provide them.
11232.suggested_remediation:
Make sure that the compose file has version specified,
Add any version less than or equal to 3.3 if you cannot get the exact version from the source

11233.name: ErrGetCrdNamesCode
11233.suggested_remediation:
Make sure the binary is valid and correct
Make sure the filter passed is correct

11234.name: ErrGetSchemasCode
11234.probable_cause: Schemas Json could not be produced from given crd.
11234.suggested_remediation: Make sure the filter passed is correct

11235.name: ErrGetAPIVersionCode
11235.probable_cause: Api version could not be parsed
11235.suggested_remediation: Make sure the filter passed is correct

11236.name: ErrGetAPIGroupCode
11236.probable_cause: Api group could not be parsed
11236.suggested_remediation: Make sure the filter passed is correct

11237.name: ErrPopulatingYamlCode
11237.probable_cause: Yaml could not be populated with the returned manifests

11238.name: ErrAbsentFilterCode
11238.probable_cause: ItrFilter or ItrSpecFilter is either not passed or empty
11238.suggested_remediation: Pass the correct ItrFilter and ItrSpecFilter

11239.name: ErrCreatingDirectoryCode
11239.probable_cause: proper file permissions were not set

11240.name: ErrGetResourceIdentifierCode
11240.short_description: Error extracting the resource identifier name
11240.probable_cause: Could not extract the value with the given filter configuration
11240.suggested_remediation:
Make sure to input a valid manifest
Make sure to provide the right filter configurations
Make sure the filters are appropriate for the given manifest

11241.name: ErrInvalidSizeFileCode
11241.long_description: Could not read the file while walking the repo
11241.probable_cause: Given file size is either 0 or exceeds the limit of 50 MB

11244.name: ErrFileNotFoundCode
11244.suggested_remediation:
Try using a different file
check if file exists

11254.name: ErrUnknownKindCode
11254.probable_cause: The component's registrant is not supported by the version of server you are running
11254.suggested_remediation: Try upgrading to latest available version

11256.name: ErrEmptySchemaCode
11256.probable_cause: The schema is empty for the component.
11256.suggested_remediation: For the particular component the schema is empty. Use the docs or discussion forum for more details

11258.name: ErrWritingRegisteryAttemptsCode
11258.long_description: Error writing RegisteryAttempts JSON data to file:
11258.short_description: Error writing RegisteryAttempts JSON data to file

11259.name: ErrRegisteringEntityCode
11259.probable_cause: Entity might be missing a required schema or have invalid json / yaml.

11261.name: ErrCreatingUserDataDirectoryCode
11261.long_description: Unable to create the directory for storing user data at:
11261.short_description: Unable to create the directory for storing user data at:

11263.name: ErrSeekFailedCode
11263.short_description: Unable to reset the position within the OCI data.
11263.probable_cause: The function attempted to move to the start of the data but failed. This could happen if the data is corrupted or not in the expected format.
11263.suggested_remediation: Ensure the input data is a valid OCI archive and try again. Check if the data is compressed correctly and is not corrupted.

11264.name: ErrCreateLayerCode
11264.long_description: An error occurred while creating the layer for the image.
11264.probable_cause: Possible issues with file system, incorrect layer type, or other IO errors.
11264.suggested_remediation:
Check the file system permissions and paths.
Ensure the layer type is correct.
Check for any underlying IO errors.

11265.name: ErrSavingImageCode
11265.long_description: An error occurred while saving the image.
11265.probable_cause: Possible issues with file system, insufficient disk space, , other IO errors.
11265.suggested_remediation:
Check the file system permissions and available disk space.
Ensure the file path is correct and accessible.
Check for any underlying IO errors.

11266.name: ErrInvalidVersionCode
11266.probable_cause: version history for the content has been tampered outside meshery
11266.suggested_remediation: rolllback to one of the previous version

11267.name: ErrDirPkgUnitParseFailCode
11267.probable_cause:
The directory might not have a valid model definition
Might be some internal issues while walking the file tree
11267.suggested_remediation:
Make sure that there is a valid model definition present in the directory. Meshery's registration pipeline currently does not support nested models, therefore the behaviour might be unexpected if it contains nested models.
If there is an internal error, please try again after some time

11268.name: ErrGetEntityCode
11268.short_description: Could not parse the given data into any Meshery entity
11268.probable_cause:
Entity definition might not be in accordance with it's corresponding schema
Might be an invalid/unsupported schemaVersion
11268.suggested_remediation:
Ensure that the definition given is in accordance with it's schema
Ensure that the schemaVersion used is valid and is supported by Meshery

11270.name: ErrImportFailureCode
11270.probable_cause:
Entity definition might not be in accordance with schema
Entity version might not be supported by Meshery
11270.suggested_remediation: See the registration logs (found at $HOME/.meshery/logs/registry/registry-logs.log) to find out which Entity failed to be imported with more specific error information.

11271.name: ErrMissingRegistrantCode
11271.long_description: Meshery models are always registered in context of a registrant.
11271.suggested_remediation: Make sure that the registrant information is present in the model definition

11272.name: ErrSeedingComponentsCode
11272.short_description: Failed to register the given models into meshery's registry
11272.probable_cause:
Given models may not be in accordance with Meshery's schema
Internal(OS level) error while reading files
11272.suggested_remediation:
Make sure the models being seeded are valid in accordance with Meshery's schema
If it is an internal error, please try again after some time

11273.name: ErrInvalidSchemaVersionCode
11273.long_description: The `schemaVersion` key is either empty or has an incorrect value.
11273.probable_cause: The schema is not of type 'relationship', 'component', 'model' , 'policy'.
11273.suggested_remediation: Verify that `schemaVersion` key should be either `relationships.meshery.io`, `component.meshery.io`, `model.meshery.io` or `policy.meshery.io`.

11274.name: ErrFileWalkDirCode
11274.suggested_remediation: Verify that the correct directory path is provided.

11275.name: ErrRelPathCode
11275.probable_cause: The user might not have sufficient permission.
11275.suggested_remediation: Verify the provided directory path is correct and if the user has sufficent permission.

11276.name: ErrCopyFileCode
11276.suggested_remediation: Verify the integrity of the file and try again.

11277.name: ErrCloseFileCode
11277.probable_cause: The user might not have sufficient permission.
11277.suggested_remediation: Check for issues with file permissions or disk space and try again.

11278.name: ErrOpenFileCode
11278.probable_cause: The file does not exist in the location
11278.suggested_remediation: Make sure to upload the correct file

11279.name: ErrGoogleJwtInvalidCode
11279.suggested_remediation: Make sure to provide valid JWT credentials

11280.name: ErrGoogleSheetSRVCode
11280.short_description: Error while creating Google Sheets Service
11280.probable_cause: Issue happened with Google Sheets Service
11280.suggested_remediation: Make you provide valid JWT credentials and Spreadsheet ID
